title: Firefox blocking facebook scripts

creator: vickyjean1007

title: How to open firefox window in fullscreen by default
content:
My POS system is set to open in firefox as defult page. So it would be nice if I could open it in full screen by default.

So Can I know, Is there any way to make the firefox window open in full screen by default?

I know that Firefox can expand to fill my entire screen with its Full Screen feature by togglling Full Screen keyboard shortcut of F11 key. But just I want to enable that feature by default.

Any suggestions on how to revert to full screen by default would be greatly appreciate.

Thanks in advance.
creator: tharangakuma

title: Closed tabs cannot be restored
content:
Until the recent update I never had trouble restoring tabs after closing Firefox. My Preferences (called Settings now ?) are checked to open previous windows and tabs.

I looked at help on this topic, at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-do-i-restore-my-tabs-last-time but the instructions would not work.

When I went to the menu/history, the Recently closed tabs option was grayed out and there is no entry for Restore previous session.

Is this a change in the latest version or a bug of some kind? Thanks.
creator: Zsuzsu

title: I moved permanently from New York to Hawaii but cannot get the clock in my MACmini to show the correct time in Hawaii. Nobody knows how to do this?
content:
Setting the clock! I moved permanently from New York to Hawaii. I have been unable to find a way to reset the clock in my MACmini to show correct time in Hawaii. It still thinks I live in New York!

Doug Pomeroy [removed email from public]
creator: audiofixer

title: Programmatically edit browser history
content:
Hi Firefox,

A site I visited recently moved to another URL. Is there a way to edit my browser history so I can still be able to keep track of which pages I have visited?

For example:

if I have visited

https://site-old.com/topic1/page1.html https://site-old.com/topic1/page2.html

I want my browser history to also contain

https://site-new.com/topic1/page1.html https://site-new.com/topic1/page2.html

So I can see that I have already visited the page1 and page2 on topic1 as the link color would be purple

Would I be able to script something in a developer console and achieve that? Or would I need to program a plugin?

thanks!
creator: xusword1

title: Bank Webpage missing pieces
content:
When I log into Wesbanco website, there is no logo or sign out in the header when I use Linux, but there is when I use Win7. I have pestered them about it, and they testify that it is a browser problem. This all started when they "upgraded" their website. 

I use Linux most of the time, and prefer it. I have no way to sign out, because the sign out button is missing..

I attached two screen shots, the one with the Wesbanco logo and sign out is Win7, the other is Linux. Any suggestions?
creator: jsapob52

title: copy words outside firefox whereas paste different words in the explorer
content: I copy some words outside firefox and the words pasted in the searching box are totally different. It's annoying. Why does this happen? How can I get over it? I really need your help as I am a dedicated firefox user. Thank you.

title: Why does Firefox consume 1.8 GB of RAM when only the downloads screen is open?
content: If I try to actually use Firefox, it often consumes all memory and freezes everything until Windows forces it to close.

title: set "print with system dialog" as default, Firefox 97.0.1
content:
Restoring printing with system dialong no longer works using about:config > print.tab_modal.enabled > false no longer works in FF 97.0.1 (Mac OS 10.13). Are there new preferences that need to be modified to default to System Dialog when printing from Firefox?

Thanks.

title: New tab
content: I use firefox because is the best in every aspect, but opening a new tab in it and typing, it takes me to address bar instead of search bar and that is annoying. Firefox search bar is useless in that way. Thanks for listening.
creator: ermiss2

title: Otravování života
content: Dobrý den! Každou další aktualizací se mi systém buď změní k horšímu, zakáže mi více dříve přístupných stránek kvůli kecům o protokolu (do toho je blbému prohlížeči naprosto hovno, mám antivirus a mám zodpovědnost), zabírá furt více zbytečného místa a procesorového času. Že neumíte programovat optimalizované kódy je jasné už od toho, co učím na vysoké. ALE! Proč nemůžu vypnout aktualizaci, když ji nechci a vím, že povede dál ze svahu?!!! Ano, nastavím a odmítnu. Otravné okno mi za chvíli zase vyběhne na pravé straně obrazovky. Už mi připomínáte Win10 s jeho vlezlostí. Jak to kromě smazání červené pandy vyřešit? Existuje v proměnných třeba EliminateFuckingUpgrade=True??? Moc prosím za help.
creator: wasik
